title: TB 115, Messages Stuck in Outbox, Folder Repairs Are Unusual
content:
Since at least this morning, TB 115.1.0 is putting outbound messages into my Outbox and not sending out. I checked all the server settings, they are correct. This is only happening in Thunderbird and I haven't changed any settings.

I have a ton of messages in this profile and the outbound messages I have stuck are a bit important. Have I encountered a bug?

I tried doing Repair on some of the mailbox folders (Inbox) and get some weird results. One account is sticking several non-Spam messages in the Spam folder and won't allow me to take them out, and that's on a different account -- I have like three Gmail accounts configured.

Help! :)
creator: forrie1

title: I do not get my email in Thunderbird however I can send email.  This is my 3rd request  so please respond
content: Can not get email thru thunderbird but can send emails. Can not figure out how to correct.
creator: opeyandct

title: Thunderbird does not delete save drafts after email is sent
content: Why is it that Thunderbird 102.13 keeps the drafts around for messages that I have already sent? It is darn frustrating to have to go into my IMAP account and get rid of drafts that TB automatically saved for messages that I have sent hours or days ago.
creator: pcguy
